meanings.definition: The action of choosing someone for a particular role or purpose.
meanings.sent1: Her designation as team captain filled her with pride.
meanings.sent2: The designation of a new CEO brought fresh ideas to the company.
meanings.sent3: The cat's self-designation as king of the house amused the family.
meanings.sent4: His designation as the chosen one made him feel like a superhero.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's designation of group leaders made the classroom run smoothly.

meanings.definition: A name, title, or identifying mark given to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The designation 'best friend' meant a lot to her.
meanings.sent2: The designation 'Made in Italy' added value to the product.
meanings.sent3: The dog's designation as 'chief cuddler' made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her designation as 'the brain' in the group was well-deserved.
meanings.sent5: The designation 'family heirloom' made the necklace even more special.
